location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Sketch of Approaches to Kuweit Harbour and Shatt Al Arab, compiled from various authorities'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paper.Dimensions: 610 x 470mm, on a sheet 655 x 480mm.

mods.abstract: A map originally issued for Fleet purposes, 2 June 1902. Large corrections made December 1904, and July 1907. Small corrections made December 1906, July 1908, and September 1908.The map shows lights, gravel, mud, rock, sand, shells and stones.
